definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
et cetera/and so on .../wait a minute!/hold on!
et cetera/and so on .../wait a minute!/hold on!
to wait until/by the time when (sth is ready etc)
equal to/having the same social class or status

sentences.english: We were kept on tenterhooks for hours while the judges chose the winner.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐立不安了好几个小时，等着裁判们决定获胜者。

sentences.english: But the formulae for calculating the inner stress of the arch pipes caused by wind oad is confined to equal section.
sentences.chinese: 而现有计算拱管风载内力的公式仅限于等截面范围。

sentences.english: Now I am making an attempt to explain the positions of categories such as primitive accumulation and some others.
sentences.chinese: 这里，对原始积累等范畴的位置，试提出一种解释。

sentences.english: To solve the problem, the welding joint construction was re-designed and argon-arc welding was employed.
sentences.chinese: 解决措施为采用氩弧焊，改进焊接结构设计等。

sentences.english: There are new spin-off products aimed at older girls and women, such as sun screen and cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 该集团还推出了太阳镜和化妆品等新的副产品。

sentences.english: Simulations have been made to validate the good separation performance of the algor…
sentences.chinese: 仿真验证对声音等非平稳信号具有良好的分离效果。

sentences.english: The child lived but had major medical problems including oxygen deprivation and bleeding in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 小孩存活了下来，但患有缺氧及脑出血等严重病症。

sentences.english: Chinese culture sees all non-Chinese as sub-human, to be exploited.
sentences.chinese: 中国文化把所有的其他人种视为有待剥削的次等民族。

sentences.english: His suggestion that Jiulong city must be a commercial port was strategic insight.
sentences.chinese: 提出了辟九龙为商埠等有战略眼光的建议。

sentences.english: After a Fan (mould) is made, pour molten bronze into it.
sentences.chinese: 等做好了范之后再把铜液倒进去。

sentences.english: I couldn't wait any longer for you. I had to go.
sentences.chinese: 我等你等得不耐烦了，我已经离开了。

sentences.english: I couldn't wait any longer for you. I had to go.
sentences.chinese: 我等你等得不耐烦了，我已经离开了。

sentences.english: Mainly dealing with camellia oil, tea drinks and tea powder and so on.
sentences.chinese: 主要生产山茶油，茶饮料和茶粉等产品。

sentences.english: And he is in prison waiting to be executed. So, he’s gonna be killed; he’s hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 他在监狱里等着行刑，很绝望。

sentences.english: Moral criteria are nature, the Tao, artificiality and manner.
sentences.chinese: 自然，道，人为，礼仪等道德标准。

sentences.english: The center conditions and isochronous center conditions for a class of quasi - analytic systems were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一类拟解析系统的中心条件与等时中心条件。

definition: et cetera/and so on .../wait a minute!/hold on!
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to comprise/to include/to involve/to incorporate/to consist of
(used for abstract things) a good deal, a lot of
